gas_limit.description: The maximum amount of gas that can be used

max_fee_per_gas.description: The maximum fee per unit of gas that the sender is willing to pay

max_priority_fee_per_gas.description: The maximum priority fee per unit of gas to incentivize miners

gas_per_pubdata_limit.description: The gas limit per unit of public data

post.description: Estimates the gas required for an L1 to L2 transaction

result.description: The estimated gas amount in hexadecimal format

post.description: Retrieves the bridge hub contract address

200.description: Returns the bridge hub contract address

result.description: The bridge hub contract address (20 bytes)

post.description: Retrieves the main contract address, also known as the DiamondProxy
Retrieves the testnet paymaster address, specifically for interactions within the ZKsync Sepolia Testnet environment. Note: This method is only applicable for ZKsync Sepolia Testnet.
Returns the range of blocks contained within a specified L1 batch

200.description: Returns the range of blocks in the batch

result.description: Array with two elements: the first and the last block number (inclusive) of the requested batch

post.description: Returns data pertaining to a specific L1 batch

200.description: Returns the details of the L1 batch

post.description: Returns the latest L1 batch number

200.description: Returns the latest L1 batch number

result.description: The latest L1 batch number in hexadecimal format

post.description: Returns the USD price of a token with the specified address

result.description: The USD price of the token

result.description: The L1 chain ID in hexadecimal format

result.description: Map of token addresses to balances

post.description: Generates Merkle proofs for one or more storage values associated with a specific account, accompanied by a proof of their authenticity

method.description: The RPC method to be invoked

200.description: Returns the account details and proofs for storage keys

address.description: Account address associated with the storage proofs

key.description: Storage key for which the proof is provided

value.description: Value stored in the specified storage key

index.description: Position of the tree entry within the Merkle tree

proof.description: Array of hashes that constitute the Merkle path

post.description: Creates a new subscription for events.

oneOf.description: Optional filter conditions for the subscription

200.description: A subscription ID used to identify and manage the subscription

post.description: Cancels an existing subscription.

items.description: The ID of the subscription to cancel

200.description: Boolean indicating if the subscription was successfully cancelled

timestamp.description: Unix timestamp of the version's activation

verification_keys_hashes.description: Hashes of various verification keys used in the protocol

default_aa.description: Hash of the default account abstraction contract

l2_system_upgrade_tx_hash.description: Hash of the transaction used for system upgrade, if any

l1BatchNumber.description: L1 batch number that includes this block

result.description: Layer 1 Ethereum address of base token

id.description: Identifier of the log within the transaction

common_data.description: General information about the L2 transaction

execute.description: Details regarding the execution of the transaction

received_timestamp_ms.description: Timestamp when the transaction was received, in milliseconds

raw_bytes.description: Raw bytes of the transaction as a hexadecimal string

result.description: Current L1 gas price in wei

compute_overhead_part.description: Compute overhead part in fee calculation

pubdata_overhead_part.description: Public data overhead part in fee calculation

batch_overhead_l1_gas.description: Overhead in L1 gas for a batch of transactions

max_pubdata_per_batch.description: Maximum amount of public data allowed per batch

address.description: Account address associated with the storage proofs

key.description: Storage key for which the proof is provided

value.description: Value stored in the specified storage key

index.description: Position of the tree entry within the Merkle tree

proof.description: Array of hashes that constitute the Merkle path
